home.subtitle: Where AI meets craftsmanship. We build tools that make machines think and developers smile.
home.disclaimer: (The machines haven't taken over yet. We're keeping an eye on them.)

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.subtitle: Tools we've set loose on the world.

hu.desc: Developer workflow CLI that extends Claude Code with custom commands. Your terminal, supercharged.

claudeBrowse.desc: Headless browser automation via Playwright for Claude Code. Let the AI do the browsing.

tensors.desc: CLI for managing safetensor model weights and browsing CivitAI. Taming tensors, one file at a time.

assistants.title: AI Assistant Frameworks
assistants.desc: Persistent memory systems and Claude Code plugins. Because even AI deserves a long-term memory.

imageGen.title: Image Generation Tools
imageGen.desc: Desktop apps and CLIs for Stable Diffusion and friends. Pixels on demand.

agents.title: ACP Agents
agents.desc: Lightweight agents for the Agent Client Protocol. Connecting AI to any editor that speaks the language.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing or using this website, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our services.

use.title: 2. Permitted Use
use.text: You may use our services only for lawful purposes. You agree not to use our services for any illegal, unauthorized, or harmful activities, and to comply with all applicable laws in your jurisdiction.

ip.title: 3. Intellectual Property
ip.text: All content, code, trademarks, and materials on this site are the property of SAIDEN unless otherwise noted. Reproduction, distribution, or creation of derivative works requires prior written consent.

disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.text: Our services are provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, express or implied. We make no guarantees regarding availability, accuracy, or reliability.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.text: To the fullest extent permitted by law, SAIDEN shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of our services.

law.title: 6. Governing Law
law.text: These terms are governed by the laws of Poland and applicable EU regulations. For users outside the EU, disputes will be resolved under Polish law in courts located in Warsaw.

changes.title: 7. Modifications
changes.text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes become effective upon posting. Your continued use constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.text: For questions about these terms, contact us at

activity.title: What We Do
activity.description: Software development, IT consulting, and infrastructure management.

overview.title: 1. Introduction
overview.text: SAIDEN ("we", "us", "our") respects your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with the GDPR (EU) and CCPA/CPRA (California).

collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
collect.item1: Contact information (name, email) when you reach out to us
collect.item2: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
collect.item3: Usage data (pages visited, time spent on site, referral source)

use.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
use.item1: To respond to your inquiries and provide support
use.item2: To improve our website and services

legal.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR)
legal.text: We process personal data based on: your consent, performance of a contract, compliance with legal obligations, or our legitimate interests (provided they do not override your fundamental rights).

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.euText: You have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, data portability, and to object to processing. You may withdraw consent at any time.
rights.usText: You have the right to know what personal information we collect, to request deletion, to opt-out of sale or sharing (we do not sell your data), and to not be discriminated against for exercising your rights.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.text: We use only essential cookies required for basic site functionality. No tracking or advertising cookies are used. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.text: We retain personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected. After this period, data is securely deleted or anonymized.

security.title: 8. Security Measures
security.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

transfers.title: 9. International Data Transfers
transfers.text: If we transfer personal data outside the EEA, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission.

contact.title: 10. Contact & Complaints
contact.text: For privacy-related inquiries, contact us at
contact.complaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection supervisory authority.
